revtext: Best products at best price....   nd different varieties too....   Awesome ambience nd very welcoming staff....   above all Ayesha ma'am s a real sweetheart 
revreply: Thanks so much for your gracious appreciation and review.   We are thrilled to note that you have had a great experience at our store.   Indeed our staff are trained by our UK Head office to ensure that we make a   difference in people's lives.   Aysha is the icing on the cake. :)
